00040 namespace Hypertable {
00041 
00045   class  NoTimeLayout : public log4cpp::Layout {
00046   public:
00047     NoTimeLayout() { }
00048     virtual ~NoTimeLayout() { }
00049     virtual string format(const log4cpp::LoggingEvent& event) {
00050       std::ostringstream message;
00051       const std::string& priorityName = log4cpp::Priority::getPriorityName(event.priority);
00052       message << priorityName << " " << event.categoryName << " " << event.ndc << ": " << event.message << std::endl;
00053       return message.str();
00054     }
00055   };
00056 
00057   class TestHarness {
00058   public:
00059     TestHarness(const char *name) {
00060 
00061       m_name = name;
00062 
00063       Logger::initialize(name);
00064 
00065       // open temporary output file
00066       sprintf(m_output_file, "%s%d", name, getpid());
00067 
00068       if ((m_fd = open(m_output_file, O_CREAT | O_TRUNC | O_WRONLY, 0644)) < 0) {
00069         HT_ERRORF("open(%s) failed - %s", m_output_file, strerror(errno));
00070         exit(1);
00071       }
00072 
00073       m_log_stream.open(m_output_file);
00074 
00075       Logger::logger->removeAllAppenders();
00076       m_appender = new log4cpp::FileAppender((string)name, m_fd);
00077       m_appender->setLayout(new NoTimeLayout());
00078       Logger::logger->setAppender(m_appender);
00079     }
00080     ~TestHarness() {
00081       unlink(m_output_file);
00082     }
00083 
00084     int get_log_file_descriptor() { return m_fd; }
00085 
00086     ostream &get_log_stream() { return m_log_stream; }
00087 
00088     void validate_and_exit(const char *goldenFile) {
00089       int exitVal = 0;
00090       m_log_stream << flush;
00091       string command = (string)"diff " + m_output_file + " " + goldenFile;
00092       if (system(command.c_str()))
00093         exitVal = 1;
00094       if (exitVal == 0)
00095         unlink(m_output_file);
00096       else
00097         cerr << "Diff Error:  " << command << endl;
00098       exit(exitVal);
00099     }
00100 
00101     void regenerate_golden_file(const char *goldenFile) {
00102       string command = (string)"cp " + m_output_file + " " + goldenFile;      
00103       system(command.c_str());
00104     }
00105 
00106     void clear_output() {
00107       if (!m_appender->reopen()) {
00108         HT_ERRORF("Problem re-opening logging output file %s", m_output_file);
00109         display_error_and_exit();
00110       }
00111     }
00112 
00113     void display_error_and_exit() {
00114       m_log_stream << flush;
00115       cerr << "Error, see '" << m_output_file << "'" << endl;
00116       /*
00117       string command = (string)"cat " + m_output_file;
00118       system(command.c_str());
00119       unlink(m_output_file);
00120       */
00121       exit(1);
00122     }
00123 
00124   private:
00125     char m_output_file[128];
00126     log4cpp::FileAppender *m_appender;
00127     const char *m_name;
00128     int m_fd;
00129     ofstream m_log_stream;
00130   };
